item.description: Hola Fanáticos del Español!!!! Tu hablas español bien? Tu hablas español asi asi? Tu hablas español un poquito? Come and join us once again for a general Spanish Conversation workshop event in which you will be grouped by level in order to practice with your conversational skills while enjoying a delicious sandwich or pastry or any other favorite snack or drink. This event will start a 7:00pm sharp and end at 9:00pm. Schedule of this event is as follows: 7:00 pm: Welcome and informal introductions and mingling; participants approach the counter to purchase their favorite drink and/or food; participants enjoy their drinks and/or food 7:30 pm: Participants are grouped by level (beginner, intermediate and advanced) 7:45pm: Participants find their group peers and start talking about topics of interest 8:45pm: Participants mingle with people from other groups 9:00pm: Event ends Participants will be asked to change partners every 10 minutes from 7:45pm to 9:00pm so that they get to know and practice with each other. Some suggest topics of discussion include: Beginner Conversational Spanish - Tu familia - Tu trabajo - Tus pasatiempos (hobbies) - ... Intermediate Conversational Spanish - Cine - Libro favorito - Latino America - ... Advanced Conversational Spanish - Calentamiento global - Derechos humanos - Recursos naturales - ... This workshop will be moderated by Marilyn, Assistant Organizer and Spanish tutor at Spanish Black Belt, leading Spanish language school servicing Boston MA. Please consult your tutor and moderator about any doubts that you may run into while talking with other participants.
item.name: Conversational Spanish Workshop
